author: Brandi Milloy
title: Hack a Minty McDonald's Shamrock Shake

organizations.name: minty mcdonald's shamrock shake homemade mcdonald's shamrock shake recipe hack

text:
Homemade McDonald's Shamrock Shake Recipe Hack a Minty McDonald's Shamrock Shake March 23, 2017 570   
Every year to celebrate St. Patrick's Day, McDonald's releases its beloved Shamrock Shake , a bright green vanilla-mint milkshake. We think we've found a suitable hack, thanks to CopyKat . Watch the video to see how easy it is to re-create the shake at home, and then print out the recipe for later. Vanilla-Mint Milkshake
